channel.description: Recent content in ratings on Mason Zhang

item.title: Ratings 2019
item.description: Intro Towards the end of 2018, I took a larger interest in films, largely thanks to a few friends who showed me the amount of thought, planning, and technology that goes into crafting a good movie. I figured I might as well document what I’ve seen. My average rating as of June 25 is 7.13. I think that’s reasonable, since I generally choose to watch good movies. Ratings are accompanied by a few paragraphs of my thoughts and are spoiler free, except for drop-down sections labelled as such.
